name: MageSlayer
description:
MageSlayer is an arcade game developed by Raven Software. It came out on 30-09-1997. It was published by GT Interactive Software. Most rawgers rated the game as "Recommended".
MageSlayer is available on PC.
Brian Pelletier, Chia Chin Lee, Kevin Schilder and Patrick J. Lipo directed the game. Chia Chin Lee and Kevin Schilder scored the game.
